articles.author: Alex Mitchell
articles.title: 'Worrisome' study shows long COVID sufferers could lose up to six IQ points - New York Post
articles.description: Nearly a quarter of American COVID-19 patients may have been affected.
articles.content:
Long COVID can reduce a person’s IQ by up to six points, worrying research has revealed. 
A report in the New England Journal of Medicine found that COVID-19 was “associated with longer-term objecti… [+2218 chars]

articles.author: Sarika Parmar
articles.title: Intuitive Machines' first moon lander also broke ground with safer, cheaper rocket-style propulsion - StartupNews.fyi
articles.description: Intuitive Machines’ first lunar lander officially lost power today after spending seven days on the moon. The lander made history for being the first American hardware to reach the lunar surface since 1972 and the first privately built spacecraft to land on t…
